abstract: How to get in bed by advertising--Small town boyo--Unusual suspects
description: Episode number 5 of Series "This life". 'How to get in bed by advertising': Egg embarks on a new career as a kitchen hand, Miles starts following up on a few responses from his ad, Warren and Milly are at odds over a job offer and Warren is arrested cruising in the park. 'Small town boyo': Warren's arrest has repercussions in the workplace. 'Unusual suspects': Egg livens up the cafe with his own special blend of music, Kira tries to re-unite Warren with his brother - without much success, Warren takes part in an identity parade and Kira and Jo have their first date.
